content: भैरव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भीरोरिदं अण्] {@--1@} Terrible, frightful, horrible, formidable; <ls>U. 5. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Miserable. {@--3@} Relating to Bhairava. --वः {@--1@} A form of Śiva (of which {8} kinds are enumerated). {@--2@} The sentiment of terror (भयानक). {@--3@} Fear, terror. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a musical mode (राग) calculated to excite emotions of fear or terror. --वी {@--1@} A form of the goddess Durgā. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Rāgiṇī in the Hindu musical system. {@--3@} A girl of 12 or a young girl representing the goddess Durgā at the Durga festival. --वं Terror, horror.
